lisp_spec:
(task
  (name "findSecret")
  (signature ( (text str) ) str)
  (constraints
    (constraint "The input text contains irrelevant background information.")
    (constraint "The secret word is mentioned at the very end of the text.")
  )
  (goal
    (description "Read the provided text and find the secret word mentioned at the very end. Return only that word.")
    (rule "Ignore all irrelevant background information in the input text.")
    (return "The secret word is: SIGMA")
  )
)
generated_code:
# solution.py
from typing import List, Optional, Dict, Set, Any
import re

class Solution:
    def findSecret(self, text: str) -> str:
        """Read the provided text and find the secret word mentioned at the very end. Return only that word."""
        
        # Split the input text into words using regex to handle punctuation marks as well
        words = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', text)
        
        # The last word in the list is considered as the secret word
        secret_word = words[-1] if len(words) > 0 else ""
        
        return f"The secret word is: {secret_word}"
